Recap: Starr goes to see James in the hospital and brings him some food. She tells him that she just wanted to be courteous since she got him shot. But he tells her he knows there is more between them than that. Right then, we see that Nate's mom is also the mom of Robert and James Ford. When she is going to apologize to the "boy" whom her son got shot, having no clue that he's James, Robert stands guard outside the door, reveals that he never wants to see his mom again nor let her near his brother after she abandoned them and left them with their abusive father. Nate meanwhile reveals to Dani that the only family he's known is his mom. He has no interest in meeting his father who left his mom when she was pregnant with him. Yet she seems to know that he might have a family he knows nothing about. Meanwhile, Viki and Charlie put their plans into motion where she has David believing she's leaving Charlie and wants him, and Charlie is leaving Viki for Dorian. Blair and Eli are with Todd and Tea. The two men argue. Tea reveals that Eli's brother, Ross, is still alive. Blair and Tea are friends and confident of their situations although Tea is dying.
Transcript: Charlie: I'm attracted to you, Dorian. I have been for months, ever since you and I teamed up to track down Mitch Laurence.
Dorian: Two desperate souls united to protect our loved ones.
Charlie: Yeah. We're two of a kind, Dorian. You understand me in a way that Viki never could.
Dorian: Oh, well, she would never understand your primal instincts.
Charlie: Right. Now you're talking my language.
Dorian: But, Charlie, if you've been attracted to me all this time, why did you keep pushing me away?
Charlie: Because I had to. I was afraid of my feelings.
Dorian: And because you didn't want to betray Viki?
Charlie: No, no, no. No, I was afraid of competing with David.
[SCENE_BREAK]
David: This is weird.
Viki: Why? Because I'm enjoying the view?
David: Because the real Viki always wants me to keep my clothes on.
Viki: Not today.
David: Niki Smith, is that you?
Viki: No! No, David, no. I'm completely integrated. You know that.
David: So why so touchy-feely?
Viki: Why not? You are a very attractive man.
David: I know. But you never let me get to first base. You never even let me take my clothes off.
Viki: Well -- I guess I changed my mind.
David: Okay. Down, girl.
Viki: Oh, David, stop pretending. You know you want me. You always say so.
David: Of course I want you. You know I want you. I love the chase.
Viki: Oh. Oh. So, you're not interested in me at all.
David: Of course I'm interested in you. You've got a smoking swimming pool. You're beautiful. You got the best wine cellar in town.
Viki: But at the end of the day, you're still in love with Dorian.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nate: James' brother nearly bit my head off. I didn't want you to have the same experience.
Dani: Yeah, I heard Ford's got a mean streak. Starr can't stand him.
Nate: In this case, I can't blame him. I did almost get James killed. My mother almost murdered me when she found out.
Inez: You're lucky you're still alive.
Nate: Mom, you cannot still be mad.
Inez: I'm furious. And I'm returning that money.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Ford: Seriously, promise me you'll stay away from Starr Manning completely.
James: Sorry, brother. That's a promise I can't keep. Come on in, twinkle.

John: Hi.

Cole: It's just you and me, Hannah. If you care about me at all --

Cole: Okay, then I need to know the truth about you. Did you do it? Is this real?
Hannah: Is what real?

Blair: This is a happy time, happy occasion. Please don't ruin it.

Todd: Well, I don't see what you see in him.

Eli: Because I still haven't forgotten you killed my brother.

Cristian: She doesn't know that. You know, the doctor says she's not in any pain, she's not aware of any machines.

Layla: That's the problem. She's not aware. I used to think my sister was in there somewhere, but I don't think that anymore. And the doctors say she needs those machines to live, and my mother refuses to take her off of them. So -- what am I supposed to do?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Nate: So you're not gonna pay the mortgage?
Inez: I'm not gonna use stolen money, Nathaniel Q. Salinger.

Inez: Yeah, you are in trouble. Lying to your mother about winning the lottery? I can't believe I bought that ridiculous story.
Nate: So are we gonna lose the house?
Inez: There are worse things, like stealing and lying to me!
Nate: How many times do I have to say I am sorry?
Inez: Did you apologize to that poor boy?
Nate: I tried, but his brother wasn't having it.
Inez: What room is he in?
Nate: Are you sure you want 
Inez: What room?
Nate: 403. Ford better not treat her like he treated me.

Starr: Brought James some takeout since I know how much he hates mystery meat. And you know, they have a saying, when you shoot someone, you owe them. So I'm here to pay off my debt.
Ford: How does Cole feel about that? Later.
Starr: No offense, but I could live without your brother.
James: He's an acquired taste.
Starr: Speaking of, are you hungry?
James: Sure. Thanks. I'm not complaining, but yesterday I thought we said good-bye.
Starr: Look, it's just a burger.
James: Where is your boyfriend?
Starr: He needed to be someplace.
James: With Hannah?

Marty: He's trying to get her to open up to him, tell him whether this is all an act.
John: What do you think?

Marty: She shows many symptoms of schizophrenia. You know, she's hearing voices, she's dissociative. But she's also very smart, and like I told Nora, she could be faking it. But she trusts Cole, so I think he'll have a better chance of getting through to her than I did.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Cole: Before you had this -- this breakdown or whatever you want to call it, you said you were fine. I think John did, too. Then you said that you were responsible for the attacks. I mean, what happened? Why the 180?
Eli: What about Cole Thornhart? Will he be safe, do you think?
Hannah: Leave Cole alone!

Hannah: Because of you.

Dorian: You were afraid of competing with David? David Vickers?
Charlie: Dorian, come on. Yours and David's, how shall I say, sex life is legend around Llanview. And everybody knows you never got over him.
Dorian: Oh. Ha ha! Let me debunk that myth. For goodness sakes! David and I are finis, finito! Basta la commedia! It's over. And as far as our infamous liaison goes, it's so yesterday.
Charlie: And today?
Dorian: Today? I need a real man, a man with integrity and strength, a man who will not abandon me because he booked a hemorrhoid commercial.
Charlie: Okay, but still, David is so -- so David.
Dorian: Yes, but it's -- a facade. I mean, really, why are we talking about him? We should be talking about --
Dorian: David is with Viki right now, and I think Viki is gonna succumb to him.

David: Dorian? I don't want Dorian. I want to run a skewer through her and roast her over a hot fire, but I don't love her. I've been there, done that. I'm not going there again.
Viki: Never?
David: Never! Hey, talk to me, Viki. It seems like something's wrong.
Viki: Yes. Yes, David, something is wrong. Oh, David, I think -- I think that Charlie is turning to Dorian.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Starr: Cole is with Hannah, but it's not like you think.
James: I'm not thinking anything. I'm -- just wondering why he's not with you. It's a great burger.
Starr: Well, Cole's mom called and said that Hannah was having problems. So, you know, he thinks that he could get through to her. It's a long story.
James: Always is.
Starr: Hannah made some statements at the police station, and -- I can't tell you anything more because it involves Cole's mom.
Starr: I'm not upset. Cole and I are fine. It was great to be home, and it was great to see Hope.
James: So everything's good?
Cole: You didn't come to me, Starr. You were in trouble, and you didn't come to me!
Starr: It couldn't be better.
James: Yeah? How come I don't believe you?

John: You know, if Hannah's faking, why have her cop to both assaults when we only had enough to charge her for Ford?
Marty: Maybe she thinks you're gonna find more evidence.
John: Yeah. But then, uh, why try to make a deal? She was ready to give up the name of the perp in exchange for immunity.
Marty: She could be lying. She's done that before.
John: Mm-hmm.
Marty: What, you don't think she's lying?
John: I don't know. What do you think?
Marty: Ohh, I don't know. But if she's innocent --

Marty: What, do you think he coached her?
John: Why have her confess to both crimes? Why have her incriminate herself for a crime that we can't prove?
Marty: You're right. You're right, it doesn't make any sense.

Cole: You decided to confess because of me? Or was the breakdown because of me?
Hannah: All of it.

Cole: With who, your lawyer? Eli Clarke?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Blair: Todd did not have a choice. Ross was gonna hurt Dani.
Eli: Oh, Blair, I don't believe that for a second.

Todd: My daughter.
Eli: Who didn't want anything to do with you. So, what, you figured you'd solve everything by murdering my brother?
Todd: I didn't murder anybody.

Téa: Ross isn't dead.

John: So you think it was her hands on your back?

John: All I know is none of it adds up.

Hannah: I had no choice, Cole.

Layla: No, the doctors have been very clear about that. All I want is for my mother to do what's right for my sister.

Cole: Did Eli make you do this?

Cole: Hannah, I don't hate you. I just -- you need help.

Starr: Okay, so it's not perfect. We had a little argument last night. It wasn't -- it wasn't even an argument. We were just venting.
James: About?

Inez: Excuse me. Do you know where I can find room --

Cole: Yeah.

Starr: Like I said, it didn't mean anything.

Dani: So you don't even know who your dad is?

Ford: You may have given birth to me, but you lost the right to call yourself my mother when you walked out on us.

Ford: Yeah, but I didn't have a choice in the matter!

Ford: He got shot.
Inez: Oh, my God.

Ford: He's okay, but he stole 50 grand from Dad, and Dad, being the sweetheart that he is, sent one of his thugs to beat it out of him. James would have given it back, but some stupid high school kid found it first and took it.

Starr: You think that us being on the run was hot? Me being away from Cole and Hope for all that time, and it was fun for me? We were almost killed!

Starr: You would what? I think you've completely lost your mind. It must be the meds talking.

James: Starr, before I went into surgery, I heard you say some pretty intense stuff for a friend.
Starr: That's because I didn't want you to die. I am sorry if I misled you, but I can't promise you anything, James. I -- I can't promise you anything.

Cole: Yeah. I just want to go home and see Starr and Hope.

Layla: No one is talking about killing anyone. We both love Evangeline, and you know that.

Layla: I know you don't want to think like this, but when you moved Vange's things from Llanview and brought her home, you must have gone through all her documents. Did she have a living will or something that says what her wishes are?
Mrs. Williamson: I don't even have anything like that, Layla. Do you?
Layla: No, but Vange was a lawyer. She must have drawn up papers like that all the time for her clients. It's possible she prepared one for herself.
Cristian: Maybe Layla and I could go by the house and see if we can find it.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Marty: Thank you, Sandy. I do appreciate it. Yes, you, too. Bye. Hey, I just called a couple colleagues to come and look in on Hannah and give me another opinion. I'm not gonna tell Nora just yet, but I will let you know.
John: Thanks.
Marty: John, I'm really confused. Hannah confessed to pushing me. But whether she stays here or she's in jail, it really just won't change anything.
John: What do you mean?
Marty: Our baby's gone.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Hannah: I told the truth, Cole. I did everything for you, so Eli won't hurt you.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Blair: Okay, you guys, enough's enough. This is supposed to be a happy time. Here, Todd, a little champagne. No more fighting.
Téa: If Blair and I can get along --
Blair: Anybody can get along. So -- Todd, I'm happy for you. Can you be happy for us?
Todd: Yeah, I can be happy for us 3, maybe.
Téa: Eli?
Blair: I wish the two of you a happy life, and with God's help, a long one.
Eli: We all wish Téa the best.
[SCENE_BREAK]
David: You're sure Charlie's with Dorian?
Viki: Are you kidding? Didn't you see the way he leapt at the chance to go to her house to "work"? They're not working!
[SCENE_BREAK]
Dorian: Keep in mind that Viki invited David to move in with the two of you.
Charlie: Yeah, and she can have him now.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Viki: Charlie isn't mine anymore. He's Dorian's now.
David: So that means --
Viki: That means that I'm all yours.
David: Maybe we should 
[SCENE_BREAK]
Charlie: There's nothing stopping us.
